name: FireOc
description:
if you just want a fun game to play when you are bored, with no complex and new rules, this game is made for you.
FireOc is a platformer game when you control a piece of Fire that lost his cousin and need to save her. You can walk, jump, shoot, don't walk, don't jump, don't shoot, get hit, don't get hit, kill enemies, ignore enemies, die, survive, collect points, ignore points, collect lives, ignore the lives and bake potatoes(damn, now i need to add this to the game, LOL).

LORE
On an universe where elements have life, they have 4 phases of life, 1. Element state; 2. Already have life; 3. Acts like an human; 4. Unknown.
People wanted to know what the fourth phase is, so 2 teenagers to know. Scientists discovered that you need to find 6 cubes to reach this phase, so the 2 teenagers (since they have an hologram that detects cubes) go on an adventure to find these cubes. 
But! A Villain appeared, he discovered that the teenagers got a hologram so he captures the female one to tell him where the cubes are. Now your objective is to rescue your cousin.

HOW2PLAY
Left and right: walk
Up: Jump
E: Shoot
Enter: Confirm
R: Quick restart
Esc: Back to menu(future pause)

Planned features
Character sprites for cutscenes(tell easily who are the characters)
Six "worlds" to FireOc
Three "worlds" to Plantilia
Three different endings
Achievements
Settings(Of course)
Bake Potato mode
Easter Eggs
